encyclopedia.title: Kitaar
encyclopedia.fact: A popular string instrument used in many music styles.

encyclopedia.title: Klavier
encyclopedia.fact: Produces sound when keys strike internal strings.

encyclopedia.title: Dromme
encyclopedia.fact: Percussion instrument played by striking skins or pads.

encyclopedia.title: Tjello
encyclopedia.fact: A low pitched string instrument held between the knees.

encyclopedia.title: Trompet
encyclopedia.fact: Brass instrument known for its bright, powerful sound.

encyclopedia.title: Viool
encyclopedia.fact: The smallest high-pitched instrument in the string family.

encyclopedia.title: Fluit
encyclopedia.fact: Woodwind instrument played by blowing across an opening.

encyclopedia.title: Saksofoon
encyclopedia.fact: Woodwind instrument commonly used in jazz music.

encyclopedia.title: Harp
encyclopedia.fact: Large instrument with many strings plucked by hand.

encyclopedia.title: Doedelsak
encyclopedia.fact: Traditional instrument that uses air stored in a bag.
